"Bruder": "That previous battle convinced me that you three have what it takes to overcome any hardships."
"However, if you want to take on a lot of DOLLS, there's still much more for you to learn."
"Thankfully, Central City has an abundance of experienced ARKS, not to mention some of the best engineers and researchers around."
"Just like you, they were also beginners here at one time, simply learning the basics. You'd do well to see what they have to tell you first."
